structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 314, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3189b, 3644, 3677.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Manner of assessment, levy and collection, how regulated by ordinance in cities of second, fifth and sixth classes.
